column1: Smoque BBQ////We go out of our way to go to Smoque when in Chicago. We are picky with barbecue- especially with brisket- and Smoque always hits the spot.  High quality ingredients
column4: solid sides... it's worth going out of the way for.  Definitely the best brisket in the Midwest. Parking can be a challenge
column5: but we make the trek anyway.
